name: orbital speed

variables.orbital_speed: speed of an object in orbit

description: Basic formula for calculating the speed of an orbiting object.

name: orbital period

variables.orbital_period: time taken for one full orbit
variables.orbital_radius: distance from the centre of orbit

description: Relates orbital radius and speed to the time for one orbit.

variables.distance: distance between the centres of the masses

name: weight

variables.gravitational_field_strength: strength of gravity on a planet or moon

description: Used to calculate weight on different planets.

name: light speed equation
description: Wave equation applied to light and other electromagnetic waves.

name: redshift

variables.observed_wavelength: measured wavelength from a distant galaxy

description: Used to measure how fast galaxies are moving away from us.

name: hubbles law

variables.recessional_velocity: speed at which a galaxy moves away
variables.hubble_constant: rate of expansion of the universe

description: Shows that galaxies further away move faster, evidence for expansion.

name: apparent brightness

variables.luminosity: total energy output of a star
variables.distance: distance from the star to the observer

description: Inverse square law for light from stars.

name: escape velocity

variables.escape_velocity: minimum speed needed to escape a body's gravity
variables.mass: mass of the planet or moon
variables.radius: distance from the centre of the body

description: Speed required to leave a planet or moon without further propulsion.

name: parallax distance

variables.distance: distance to the star in parsecs

description: Used to measure distances to nearby stars.
